mapper.select: select r.id, r.name, r.name_info, v.reply_text from restaurant r, reviews v where r.id=v.restaurant_id and v.writer = #{username} order by r.id desc
select r.id, r.name, r.name_info from restaurant r, reserve s where r.id=s.restaurant_id and s.username = #{username} order by r.id desc
select r.id, r.name, r.name_info from restaurant r, bookmark b where r.id = b.restaurant_id and b.username = #{username} order by r.id desc
select r.id, r.name, r.name_info, v.reply_text, v.star_score from restaurant r, reviews v where r.id=v.restaurant_id and v.writer = 'chklee1' order by r.id desc

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM restaurant r, reserve s WHERE r.id = s.restaurant_id AND s.username = #{username}) AS reserveCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM restaurant r, bookmark b WHERE r.id = b.restaurant_id AND b.username = #{username}) AS bookmarkCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM restaurant r, reviews v WHERE r.id = v.restaurant_id AND v.writer = #{username}) AS reviewCnt FROM dual
select user_image from users where username = #{username}
select title, content, makgora_type from makgora where writer = #{username}
